example.eg: Robert piled some more coal on the fire.
My grandmother really knows how to pile on the guilt; if I don't go to see her for a few days, she makes me feel terrible.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 增加负担, 加重压力, 加重负罪感

example.eg: The boss has really been piling on the work lately; I'm struggling to keep up with it.
Our maths teacher is piling the homework on us this term; I'm struggling to keep up.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 给某人增加某事的工作量

dsense.name: pile on
